name: Valkyrie: Battle of Asgard
description:
One valkyrie. One hundred waves of impossible odds.

Ragnarok approaches and the heavily outnumbered Asgard defenders face their doom with grim desperation. Your lone valkyrie must fend off thousands of enemies with no hope of reinforcements. Can she survive the nearly endless waves of desolation? Pick from one of five battle maidens, each with her unique weapon and fighting style. Gain the favor of the gods Odin, Freya, Heimdall among others to learn new abilities. Buy weapons of great power. Still it will not be enough.

How many waves can you battle before you inevitably fall? 

Few can make it. Are you one of them?

This is an early access game. Comments and suggestions welcome! If you like the game please support us!
